org.apache.cassandra.hadoop.pig

Class CassandraStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.LoadFunc
      • org.apache.cassandra.hadoop.pig.AbstractCassandraStorage
        • org.apache.cassandra.hadoop.pig.CassandraStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.pig.LoadMetadata, org.apache.pig.StoreFuncInterface

    public class CassandraStorage
extends AbstractCassandraStorage
    A LoadStoreFunc for retrieving data from and storing data to Cassandra A row from a standard CF will be returned as nested tuples: (key, ((name1, val1), (name2, val2))).

    • Nested Class Summary
